description:
Themes - Widget & Wallpapers - the leading fast and professional themes app of 2024 that elevates the visual appeal of your phone with its vast collection of icon changer, top widgets, and aesthetic wallpapers.

Change your home screen with one of our many aesthetic wallpapers, make your home screen look cool with our cool wallpapers and change the look of your phone with themes our favorite topic! Fully customize your phone with our fancy themes app.

Get ready to transform your home screen into a personalized masterpiece with these exciting features:

Stay on top of the latest trends as Themes - Widget & Wallpapers updates regularly, ensuring you have access to fresh and trendy themes to keep your phone's appearance up to date. Themes updates allows you to personalize your home screen with a variety of features and styles ranging from Cute themes, Anime themes, KPOP themes to seasonal themes like Christmas and Halloween and match with every iOS device. Express your unique style and create a visually stunning interface that suits your preferences.

【Many exquisite widgets】

One of the standout features of Themes - Widget & Wallpapers app is its extensive collection of top widgets. Users can choose from a variety of widget styles, sizes, and designs to create a unique and functional home screen. Whether it's displaying the weather or quick access to favorite apps, the widget customization options are diverse and cater to individual preferences.

【HD wallpaper changer】

Themes - Widget & Wallpapers gives you 4K & Full HD wallpaper backgrounds to change wallpaper. And the 4K HD photos are updated daily!

【Diverse icons changer】

Customize your homescreen even further with a wide range of icon changers. From fresh and modern styles to cute, lovely, and fun designs, you'll find the perfect icons to complement your home screen and give it a unique touch. Help you change & customize icons and names for any apps. The new icons can be chosen from gallery, other app icons and lots of personalized icon changer. Our app will create a shortcut to the new icon on your home screen. This is the easiest way to decorate your phone.

【Personalize your own themes, widgets & wallpapers】

The app goes beyond top widgets and HD wallpapers with its theme packs. These pre-designed packs include a cohesive set of wallpapers, icons, and widgets that work together to create a unified and visually pleasing look. Users can choose from a variety of theme packs or mix and match different widgets, app icons to create their own unique themes.

【Easy One-Click Replacement】

Save time and energy with the app's convenient one-click replacement feature. Simply choose your preferred icon changer, themes, widgets, and wallpapers, and with a one click, transform your device's appearance to match your desired aesthetic.

An indispensable application for those who like aesthetics
▪ Exquisite app icons!
▪ Super fast update speed!
▪ Diverse themes, app icons!
▪ Personalization just for you!
▪ Easy one-click replacement!
▪ Easy access & Custom widget, app icons give you special interface (UI)

Explore our enormous collection of stylish icons, themes, wallpapers, and widgets! You’re free to jazz up your phone’s Lock & Home Screens to your taste.


And it's not just about the look. With Themify widgets for Lock & Home screens and StandBy, you can keep the info you need handy, turn your phone into a smart display, and even have a digital pet right on your screen!


COMPLETE MAKEOVER of your device!

Themify gives you a wide range of tools to express yourself. With our app, you're free to customize your phone to your liking. Enjoy state-of-the-art content and unleash your creativity!

Key features:


■ 3-in-1 Themes


Whether you love dark hues or you’re a diehard pastel fan, you can decorate your screen to create a harmonious space! Install a theme that suits your taste, and watch your app icons, widgets, and wallpapers come together seamlessly.


■ Vast Widget Collection
Interactive widgets to track activities that are important to you, e.g., sleep or steps
Widgets with time & calendar, weather, inspiring quotes, or just eye-pleasing pics—add any info right to your Home & Lock Screens
Cute digital pets (remember to feed and bathe them!)
Widgets for StandBy with always-on time, date, or real-time weather
Informative widgets created especially for iPad

■ Theme Maker

If you’d like to add a personal touch to your Home Screen theme, use our Theme Maker. Feel completely free to change whatever you want and create a one-of-a-kind design for your device.


■ 2000+ Icon Packs


For those who are bored with the same standard app icons, we have an array of custom icon packs. You'll surely find content that resonates with your unique taste!


■ Live and Still Wallpapers

Anime, Urban, Animals, Nature, Cars, just to name a few—we have still and live wallpapers for every taste and mood! With Themify, you're entirely free to choose any wallpaper that perfectly suits your vibe.


■ Apple Health Integration 


Sync Themify with the Health app and effortlessly track your daily sleep, steps, and water intake from convenient and stylish widgets. 

UNLIMITED ACCESS MEMBERSHIP SUBSCRIPTION
• You can subscribe to all features within Themify for unlimited access.
• Subscriptions are billed weekly or annually at the rate selected depending on the subscription plan.

Turn ordinary photos into eye-catching masterpieces — instantly.

Photo Editor is your all-in-one tool for enhancing, transforming, and stylizing any image with the power of AI — no editing skills required.

Perfect for casual users, creatives, content creators, or anyone who wants to make their photos stand out — fast.

Key features:

◆ AI Photo Enhancer
Improve clarity, fix lighting, and upscale image quality instantly. Bring old, pixelated, or low-light photos back to life with one tap.

◆ Transform Photos into Art
Upload a photo and let AI reinterpret it using creative visual styles inspired by iconic aesthetics, animation, or art movements. Choose your favorite and see your image transformed in seconds.

◆ Remove Backgrounds Instantly
Cut out subjects from any photo with pixel-perfect precision. Use it for profile pics, product images, or to place your subject in a brand-new setting.

◆ Apply AI-Powered Filters
Discover a wide range of unique filters — from dreamy, fantasy-like effects to sleek modern styles. Powered by AI, each filter gives your image a totally new look.

◆ Colorize Black & White Images
Give your vintage or grayscale photos new life by adding realistic, AI-generated colors. Ideal for restoring memories or experimenting with artistic effects.

No more complex tools or steep learning curves. Just upload a photo and let AI do the magic.

Photo editor app is available for free download and offers the option for convenient auto-renewal of unlimited usage subscriptions. To unlock access to all the features mentioned above, a subscription to the premium content within the app is required. Subscribing grants you full access to the app's functionalities. Download Photo Editor today and start transforming your photos like never before.

Easily redesign your home in a variety of stunning styles using advanced AI technology.​​ Home AI brings the expertise of an interior designer right into your pocket!

Simply take or upload a photo of the room and space you wish to redesign, choose a style, and receive instant interior design alternatives with unparalleled detail and accuracy. 

Whether you aim to modernize your living room, add a touch of elegance to your bedroom, or completely revamp your kitchen, Home AI has got you covered.
Whether you're an existing homeowner looking for a fresh new look, or a real estate agent staging the perfect property, our app is your ideal design partner. Home AI is here to serve as your personal AI interior design assistant, transforming your space in real time and providing personalized interior designs tailored specifically for your space.

【Effortless Interior Design at Your Fingertips】

Instant Room Makeover: Take a picture of any room in your house, and Home AI's advanced AI technology will instantly generate stunning interior design concepts tailored to your space. Witness the magic unfold as your vision comes to life before your eyes, with every detail thoughtfully optimized.

A World of Interior Design Styles: Unleash your inner decorator with our extensive library of over 10 diverse interior design styles. From the sleek minimalism of modern interior design to the calming serenity of a zen aesthetic, Home AI caters to every taste. Experiment with various styles, mix and match elements, and discover the perfect look that reflects your unique personality.

AI-Powered Recommendations that Go Beyond Style: Home AI doesn't just suggest a new look; it provides insightful recommendations on furniture, decor, and color schemes that perfectly complement your chosen style. Create a harmonious and cohesive space that feels truly lived-in.

【More Than Just Visualization:】

Save and Share Your Concepts: Capture and store your favorite interior design concepts for future reference. Share your transformed spaces with friends, family, or even professional interior designers to gather valuable feedback and refine your vision. Collaborate effortlessly and bring your design dreams to life.

Find Inspiration from Endless Possibilities: Home AI acts as your personal interior design muse, offering endless inspiration to spark your creativity. Explore different concepts and experiment with various styles to find the perfect balance that reflects your unique taste and elevates your space.

【Home AI is the ultimate tool for anyone who wants to:】

Effortlessly visualize interior design ideas and see their dream home come to life
Explore a vast library of interior design styles and discover their perfect aesthetic
Refresh a single room or plan a complete home makeover with ease
Collaborate with friends, family, and professionals to create a personalized space
Spark their creativity and find endless interior design inspiration

Download Home AI today and unlock a world of interior design possibilities! Reimagine your space, redefine your style, and create the home of your dreams with the power of cutting-edge AI technology.

iScreen - personalized homescreen with various Widgets & Themes & Wallpaper to make your phone screen stand out!

Besides widgets, iScreen also offers various Themes, Wallpapers, AI-generated artwork, Charging Animations, and other features to make your phone screen more beautiful and unique.

Special feature:  
【iOS 26】

It also offers creative lock screen styles like Emojis, Animations, and Icons, with support for transparent effects — making your phone both fun and practical.

Transform your iPhone into a personal masterpiece with Wallpics, the ultimate destination for stunning live wallpapers, DIY wallpaper creations, charging animations, pfp icons, matching wallpaper sets, and true 4K quality backgrounds. Whether you’re looking to refresh your lockscreen or craft a cohesive home-and-lockscreen theme, Wallpics delivers everything you need to make your device truly yours.

Endless Live Wallpapers & 4K Quality Backgrounds
• Dive into a vast library of dynamic live wallpapers in breathtaking 4K quality—fluid animations that bring motion and depth to your lockscreen and home screen.
• Browse categories from abstract art and nature scenes to futuristic cityscapes, all rendered in ultra-high definition for crisp, vibrant visuals.
• Enjoy smooth playback and perfect compatibility with iOS’s Live Photo lockscreen feature—your screen has never looked this alive.

DIY Wallpaper Studio
• Unleash your creativity with Wallpics’s intuitive wallpaper maker. Mix and match patterns, colors, and textures to design your own custom backgrounds in minutes.
• Add text, overlays, and stickers—or start with our premium templates to craft a signature look.
• Export your creations in both standard and 4K resolutions, ready to set as your lockscreen, home screen, or share with friends.

Charging Animations & Dynamic Effects
• Impress every time you plug in: choose from a gallery of charging animations that light up around your battery icon—so fun, you’ll look forward to low battery!
• From neon pulses and sparkles to liquid fills and energy ripples, our power-on effects are fully customizable and optimized for iOS.

Premium PFP Icons & Matching Wallpaper Sets
• Personalize your social profiles with a curated collection of pfp icons—stylized avatars, minimalist logos, and neon glyphs that pop on any background.
• Coordinate your entire device aesthetic with matching wallpaper bundles—lockscreen and home screen designs that complement each other perfectly.
• Keep your theme cohesive across apps by exporting both backgrounds and pfp icons at once.

Features at a Glance

Live Wallpapers: Animated lockscreen backgrounds & home screen motion

DIY Wallpaper: Custom background studio with templates, text & stickers

Charging Animations: Dynamic power-on effects for every charge

PFP Icons: Profile picture avatars in multiple styles and resolutions

Matching Wallpaper Sets: Coordinated lockscreen + home screen bundles

4K Quality: Ultra-HD backgrounds and exports

Ready to elevate your iPhone experience? Download Wallpics now and unlock a universe of live wallpapers, DIY creations, charging animations, pfp icons, matching wallpaper, and 4K quality backgrounds—tailored just for you!
